text: The Adder is a versatile multirole ship manufactured by Zorgon Peterson, produced from 2914 to the present. It is a highly customizable and rugged craft, suitable for newer commanders, with few notable downsides. The Adder can take on any role, especially trading and exploration, more than adequately.

The Adder has a cost of 87,808 CR and an insurance value of 4,390 CR. It features dimensions of 31.5m x 28.8m x 9.6m, with a hull mass of 35 t. The ship has an armor rating of 162 with a hardness of 35, shields of 78 MJ, and a heat capacity of 170. It has a fuel capacity of 8 t, a top speed of 220 m/s (default) or 255 m/s (upgraded), and a boost speed of 321 m/s (default) or 372 m/s (upgraded). The unladen jump range is 9.12 ly (default) or 32.96 ly (upgraded), with a cargo capacity of 6 t (default) or 30 t (max).

The Adder features 2x Utility Mounts, 2x Small Hardpoints, and 1x Medium Hardpoint. It has 3x Class 1 Compartments, 2x Class 2 Compartments, and 2x Class 3 Compartments. The default outfitting includes Pulse Lasers (Class 1, Rating F) on the small hardpoints and empty utility mounts. The bulkhead is equipped with Lightweight Alloys (Class 1, Rating I), and the reactor bay has a Power Plant (Class 3, Rating E). The thrusters are Class 3 (Rating E), and the Frame Shift Drive is Class 3 (Rating E). The environment control is managed by Life Support (Class 1, Rating E), and the power coupling is a Power Distributor (Class 2, Rating E). The sensor suite is Class 3 (Rating E), and the fuel store is a Fuel Tank (Class 3, Rating C). Internal compartments include Cargo Racks, Shield Generator, Advanced Docking Computer, Supercruise Assist, and a PAS (Class 1, Rating I).
